session_summary: Jolene and Deborah caught up at 4:03 pm on 28 March, 2023. Jolene shared a breakthrough in her engineering project after a long time, while Deborah bought yoga props and candles to enhance her practice. They discussed scents, music, and albums for yoga, with Jolene liking Nils Frahm and Olafur Arnalds, and Deborah recommending the album "Sleep." They parted ways with Jolene saying, "See you!" and Deborah encouraging her to "keep up the good work."

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person's hand holding a pair of scissors
conversation_turns.text: Hey Deb, long time no talk. A lot's happened! On Friday I had a breakthrough with my engineering project. Finally found a solution to a prob that's been bugging me. Feels great to see my hard work paying off.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a group of people doing yoga in a room
conversation_turns.text: You've really proven your skills. Feels great, right? Keep it up! And I bought new props for the yoga class! Here it is in action.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a cardboard mat with a cup of coffee on it
conversation_turns.text: Oh, I also have new details for this case! Rate it!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a candle with a sprig of rosemary on a table
conversation_turns.text: That`s cool! I also bought this candle for the atmosphere and to improve my yoga practice. How about you? When you do it, what feelings do you get?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I feel relaxed during this activity. I love creating a serene space with soothing scents like lavender and rosemary. Do you have any favorite scents or rituals for when you do it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: I'm also a big fan of scents like this! Candles and essential oils add warmth and calm to my yoga session. It's amazing how certain smells can transport you to a place of peace.  Do you have any other ways to enhance your yoga practice?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I find music helps me. Any favorite tracks?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: I find instrumental tracks with mellow melodies and rhythms help create a peaceful vibe. One of my favorites is a track called "Savana." What songs/artists do you like listening to during your practice?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I love listening to Nils Frahm and Olafur Arnalds during my practice. Their music is so calming and puts me in a different headspace. Do you have any recommendations for other similar artists or tracks I should check out?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Also, I'm listening to an album called 'Sleep,' which is great for meditation and deep relaxation. Hope you find it as calming as I do!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Thanks for the tips, Deborah! I'm gonna check them out. It's always good to have some new tunes for yoga!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Let me know your thoughts on the albums!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Take care and keep up the good work!

Deborah: Deborah purchases some yoga mats and blocks for her yoga classes.
Jolene: Jolene has a breakthrough in her robotics project.
